This package is for creating simple applications.

``# app = TeraApp('title', x, y 'color')``\n
``# app = TeraAppWIcon('title', x, y 'logo', 'color')``\n

``
app.txt()
app.icon()
app.img()
app.input()
app.button()
app.sidebar
app.appbar
app.buttonf() - button with function
app.inputr() - input with resize
app.buttonfr() - button with function and resize
app.txtc() - text with color
app.app.exec()``
